content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential landlord named Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord was looking for a price closer to 550 euros, while as a student, my limit was 540 euros, and I couldn't go higher.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the negotiation partner a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I rated the negotiation partner a 10 because they were respectful, clear in their communication, and showed understanding of my position. They were also fair and reasonable in their negotiations.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
